appropedia-policies: Text of the Policies link in the footer
appropedia-contact: Text of the Contact link in the footer
appropedia-admin-panel: Text of the Admin panel link in the sidebar
appropedia-page-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a page
appropedia-anon-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a page anonymously
appropedia-user-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a user page other than your own
appropedia-interface-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a page in the MediaWiki namespace
appropedia-template-edit-warning: Warning message when editing a template
appropedia-account-created: Message when a user creates an account
appropedia-create-user-page: Text of the button to create your user page
appropedia-create-page: Text of the button to create this page when following a red link
appropedia-select-files: Text of the button to select files to upload
appropedia-not-own-work: Message when uploading a file through the simplified upload form of the visual editor
appropedia-download-pdf: Text of the button to print or download the current page as PDF
appropedia-searchprofile-pages: Text of the search tab for content pages
appropedia-searchprofile-files: Text of the search tab for file pages
appropedia-searchprofile-users: Text of the search tab for user pages
appropedia-searchprofile-talks: Text of the search tab for talk pages
appropedia-searchprofile-other: Text of the search tab for other pages
appropedia-search-page-type-any: Text of the search option to search pages of any type
appropedia-search-page-type-projects: Text of the search option to search project pages only
appropedia-search-page-type-devices: Text of the search option to search device pages only
appropedia-search-page-type-topics: Text of the search option to search topic pages only
appropedia-search-page-type-organization: Text of the search option to search organization pages only
appropedia-search-page-type-essays: Text of the search option to search essays only
appropedia-search-page-type-papers: Text of the search option to search papers only
appropedia-search-page-type-books: Text of the search option to search books only
appropedia-search-page-type-literature-r: Text of the search option to search literature reviews only
appropedia-search-page-sdg-any:

appropedia-search-page-language-any: Text of the search option to search pages in any language
appropedia-search-file-type-any: Text of the search option to search files of any type (images, audios, videos, etc)
appropedia-search-file-type-images: Text of the search option to search files of the image only (JPG, PNG, etc)
appropedia-search-file-type-drawings: Text of the search option to search files of the drawing type only (SVG, etc)
appropedia-search-file-type-documents: Text of the search option to search files of the document type only (PDF, Word, etc)
appropedia-search-file-type-code: Text of the search option to search files of the code type only (PHP, JavaScript, etc)
appropedia-search-file-type-videos: Text of the search option to search files of the video type only (MP4, AVI, etc)
appropedia-search-file-type-audios: Text of the search option to search files of the audio type only (MP3, WAV, etc)
appropedia-search-file-format-any: Text of the search option to search files of any format (JPG, PNG, WAV, etc)
appropedia-search-file-license-any: Text of the search option to search files with any license (CC-BY-SA-4.0, MIT, etc)
appropedia-search-file-license-public-do: Text of the search option to search files in the public domain only
appropedia-search-user-location-any: Text of the search option to search users in any location
